articles.title: Majority of Filipinos believe VP Sara should face impeachment trial - OCTA survey
articles.description: MANILA, Philippines — A clear majority of Filipinos believe Vice President Sara Duterte should face impeachment trial in the Senate, the latest nationwide survey conducted by OCTA Research showed.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — A clear majority of Filipinos believe Vice President Sara Duterte should face impeachment trial in the Senate, the latest nationwide survey conducted by OCTA Research showed.

MANILA – Quezon City recorded 421 new human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) cases from January to May this year. That is over 7.7 percent higher than the cases logged in the same period in 2024.

articles.title: Apple WWDC 2025 event today: When and where to watch the LIVE-Stream?
articles.description: Apple's WWDC 2025 kicks off in Cupertino today, showcasing new software versions and innovations. The event will stream live at 10am PT, featuring potential major updates including a new naming scheme for software versions and an enhanced user interface based on visionOS.
